item.title: HUMAN EXPERIENCE FOR TRANSHUMAN
item.description:
XHuman: Educational Headset for transhumans to Experience “Human” in 2075 XHuman is an educational headset for transhumans who inplants superintelligence into their left brain which works for language, memory, calculation. This gadget stimulates your brain electrically and temporarily stops the neurotransmission between the brain chip and the brain. This feature enables transhumans to think as “Humans.”
How can Humans and Transhumans coexist towards a sustainable society in 2075?
